issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch KS master in mobile web preview in browser (Firefox)

Actual result:
There are not titles in the tabs only images

Expected result:
There are titles for the respective tabs (i.e. Base UI, Controls, etc)
fields.summary: MobileWeb : Firefox - In KS tabs do not have titles only images
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 1.0.8.201201262211
Ti Mob SDK 1.9.0.v20120208180134
OSX Lion 10.7.3
Firefox 10.0

comments.body: See TIMOB-6604. KS tabs use localization to set the title, which we haven't implemented yet.
